game.title: Treasure Hunt
game.description: You have been tasked to find a hidden treasure that is believed to be in the Lost Forest

task.objective: Get the map from Old Man Jenkins
task.description: Old Man Jenkins has a map that will guide you to the treasure. He is located at the town centre

task.objective: Reach the entrance of Lost Forest
task.description: Use the map to reach the forest. Be careful of wild animals!
The treasure is believed to be located near a big red tree somewhere deep in the forest.
